This feature is used to collect the opinions and suggestions of Lenovo phone users concerning various features.Please complete the following information to help us more quickly solve your feedback problems.Thank you!
Please select a main interface style
The local version is outdated. You can update this app (%d)
The local version is the latest version on the server (%d)
This app is not installed locally. You can download it (%d)
Update failed due to network error or because the server is currently updating data. Please try again later.
Loading list of latest app versions…
Turn on real-time log collector(this lets us effectively locate the problem)
Real-Time Log collect service is running…
Submission failed. Please check the network
Permission READ_LOGS has been granted.Press OK to restart application self.
Real-Time Log collect service is running, please turn off first.
You have not got any real-time logs.
No feedback information at the moment
You have not yet installed any Lenovo recommended apps
You can use the icon in the top-right corner to choose to display \"Apps List\" or \"Feedback Type\"
Incorrect username or password. Please try again
Neither the username nor password can be blank
You have logged in with the account \"%s\". Do you want to log out?
You have logged in with the account \"%s\". Do you want to switch accounts or log out?
Login failed. Please check the network or use another login method
Use Lenovo internal employee ITCode to log in
"The user accounts for ITCode users and Lenovo internal users to log into t3 homepage. The password has been encrypted to ensure secure transmission. You can use it with peace of mind."
Log in directly with no certification required
Friendly reminder: After entering the app, you can switch accounts through the menu and get different app versions
For logging in with Lenovo internal ITCode
For logging in as a non-authenticated user
You have already approved this feedback info
No network connection currently. Please set one first.
Hold on! You are already logged in. What else do you want to do?
You have already logged in with the account \"%s\". Do you want to log out?
%d of your feedback message(s) have a new reply. Please click to view
Thank you for gently moving your finger. It will help us improve!
The name may not contain Lenovo Official. Please reenter it
Incorrect number format. Remember to add the area code for landlines. Please reenter it
Invalid email address. Please reenter it
Reached character limit. Thank you for your detailed feedback
Reached character limit. Thank you for your detailed reply

No memory card found. Cannot upload images. Continue sending?

"More mobile landscaping resource coming soon!Please expect“^_^”"
"LENOVO FOR THOSE WHO DO. LENOVO THEME CENTER"
"Lenovo Theme Center Dress it up, take it out"
All-around theme experience to dress up your phone and satisfy all your personalization needs when using your phone from switching it on down to turning it off.
Allows the app to access the download manager and to use it to download files. Malicious apps can use this to disrupt downloads and access private information.
"Allows the app to access the download manager's advanced functions. Malicious apps can use this to disrupt downloads and access private information."
Allows the app to send notifications about completed downloads. Malicious apps can use this to confuse other apps that download files.
See all downloads to SD card
Allows the app to see all downloads to the SD card, regardless of which app downloaded them.
Reserve space in the download cache
"Allows the app to download files to the download cache, which can't be automatically deleted when the download manager needs more space."
Allows the app to download files through the download manager without any notification being shown to the user.
Allows the app to view and modify all downloads initiated by any app on the system.
Download too large for operator network

"You must use Wi-Fi to complete this download.
please start this download the next time you're connected to a Wi-Fi network."

"Starting this download now may shorten your battery life and/or result in excessive usage of your mobile data connection, which can lead to charges by your mobile operator depending on your data plan.
start this download the next time you're connected to a Wi-Fi network."
Do you want to retry downloading the file later or delete it from the queue?
"This file is queued for future download so isn't available yet."

"Can't finish download. There isn't enough space on internal download storage."
